sub_title: PhD Student - University of Birmingham, UK | Marketing Specialist - Pivot Services
summary:
My PhD research looks at possible connections between language attitudes, home language environment and academic achievement in d/Deaf/Hard of Hearing mainstreamed high school students. 

Visit my project website: http://languageattitudesmatter.com for more information. I'm recruiting D/HH mainstreamed high school students from the US to participate in my study!
